meanings.sent1: The slime on the monster's skin made it even gooier.
meanings.sent2: The sticky candy became gooier in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The gooier the mud, the more fun the kids had playing in it.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was gooier than a melting ice cream cone.
meanings.sent5: The gooier the glue, the better it holds things together.

meanings.sent1: This slime is gooier than the one we saw yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The new recipe made the cake gooier than before.
meanings.sent3: The gooier the sandwich, the messier it gets when you eat it.
meanings.sent4: His excuses were gooier than a pile of melted ice cream.
meanings.sent5: The gooier the paint, the smoother the finish on the wall.
